enhanced_by.reason: The isValid method should be invoked before validate to ensure the value is valid according to the regular expressions.
The match method should be invoked before validate to ensure the value can be matched and processed correctly.
The toString method provides a string representation of the validator, which can be used to assert the state of the validator after validation.
The getPatterns method can be used to verify the patterns used in the validation process, ensuring they match the expected patterns.
